title: Building libjson-c in parallel fails, but in serial works
body:
I get a weird 'not found: -ljson-c' compile error when building libjson-c in parallel (8 cores).  The 3 times that I tried to build in parallel, it failed each time.  When I changed 'make()' to 'make(parallel=False)', it worked on the first time.

Do others run into the same issue?  I didn't want to submit a PR that forces json-c to build in serial out of fear this is somehow unique to my setup.

Last 20 lines of the build log:

```
→ tail -n 20 /private/var/folders/c_/342_23bd6xs4gb8_l88w82fh001k1j/T/herbein1/spack-stage/spack-stage-0slLT3/json-c-0.11/spack-build.out
libtool: compile:  /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-unused-parameter -std=gnu99 -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_REENTRANT -g -O2 -MT libjson.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/libjson.Tpo -c libjson.c  -fno-common -DPIC -o .libs/libjson.o
mv -f .deps/printbuf.Tpo .deps/printbuf.Plo
mv -f .deps/debug.Tpo .deps/debug.Plo
libtool: compile:  /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-unused-parameter -std=gnu99 -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_REENTRANT -g -O2 -MT json_object.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/json_object.Tpo -c json_object.c -o json_object.o >/dev/null 2>&1
libtool: compile:  /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-unused-parameter -std=gnu99 -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_REENTRANT -g -O2 -MT libjson.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/libjson.Tpo -c libjson.c -o libjson.o >/dev/null 2>&1
libtool: compile:  /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-unused-parameter -std=gnu99 -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_REENTRANT -g -O2 -MT linkhash.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/linkhash.Tpo -c linkhash.c -o linkhash.o >/dev/null 2>&1
mv -f .deps/json_util.Tpo .deps/json_util.Plo
mv -f .deps/libjson.Tpo .deps/libjson.Plo
/bin/sh ./libtool --tag=CC   --mode=link /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-unused-parameter -std=gnu99 -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_REENTRANT -g -O2 -version-info 1:0:1 -no-undefined -ljson-c  -o libjson.la -rpath /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0/libjson-c-0.11-grtp65kpfqqx4h2ivb5n4aqogysa4buh/lib libjson.lo -ljson-c
libtool: link: /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -dynamiclib  -o .libs/libjson.0.dylib  .libs/libjson.o   -ljson-c    -install_name  /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0/libjson-c-0.11-grtp65kpfqqx4h2ivb5n4aqogysa4buh/lib/libjson.0.dylib -compatibility_version 2 -current_version 2.0 -Wl,-single_module
libtool: compile:  /Users/herbein1/Repositories/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wwrite-strings -Wno-unused-parameter -std=gnu99 -D_GNU_SOURCE -D_REENTRANT -g -O2 -MT json_tokener.lo -MD -MP -MF .deps/json_tokener.Tpo -c json_tokener.c -o json_tokener.o >/dev/null 2>&1
ld: library not found for -ljson-c
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[2]: *** [libjson.la] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
mv -f .deps/linkhash.Tpo .deps/linkhash.Plo
mv -f .deps/json_object.Tpo .deps/json_object.Plo
mv -f .deps/json_tokener.Tpo .deps/json_tokener.Plo
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make: *** [all] Error 2
```
